content.description: Sit start at the Horizontal as per the Clapper. Move right on crimps to top out at the finish of Not the Clapper.
content.location: On the Clapper boulder in the west rim

content.description:
Sit start at the good hold and pull up into the shallow groove, which is followed directly up and over to the top.

Slightly easier than its neighbor.

Sit start with hand on good holds.   Move up to the left trending rail and following it left and up.

Make a hard move to gain hidden holds on the lip, and then continue directly to finish.
content.location: Right side of the West face

content.description: Sit start at a good incut hold.   Pull on and make a powerful move up and left to gain a good jug.   From this just continue left and up to finish easily.
content.location: Left side of the North West Arete

content.description: The crux is going to be moving off of teh wide slopy pinch which can be done with either hand. Somewhat contrived in that the scoop of Pig Pen is off, so stick to the arete and holds to the right. May be easier for those with big hands and a long reach to gain the sloper at the top.
content.location: Starts in the horizontal on the arete to the right of the Pig Pen scoop and moves up and right following the arete to the top.

content.description: Start as for Not The Clapper on the right side of the face. Climb up and slightly left using good holds to reach a sloping rail feature. Throw up a heel hook and move further left to a small micro-crimp rail. Adjust the heelhook and go up to the sloping lip. open hand it or find another small edge to bite down on and go up left hand to another sloper on the lip, there is a small mono-digit divot that is useful. from here make a desperate throw with the left hand to a shallow dish and throw a foot over and mantel. The holds on the top out of Not the Clapper are off. An eliminate, and very difficult. An old school classic.
content.location: on the Clapper boulder. Start on the right side of the rock and follow the rail up and left above the blank section. Then top out.
